texts.content_text1: Ana's Case Study: Beyond the Courtroom
texts.content_text2:
Ana has no family, no safe place to live, and shows signs of psychological distress.

As a lawyer of Ana, you…
texts.content_text100: Focus only on the criminal case and prepare her testimony to make the case more solid stronger
texts.content_text101: Request specialised child-support services, including psychological care and safe accommodation.
texts.content_text3: Child victims have the right to support services aimed at recovery and reintegration. Justice must address not only prosecution of the offender but also the child’s safety, well-being, and development.
